lead_paragraph: BARINAS, Venezuela, July 2 (AP) — Four days after being routed by Argentina in its Copa América opener, the United States was humbled again Monday night in a 3-1 loss to Paraguay that put the Americans on the brink of elimination from South America’s championship.
